a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Coal output from opencast and deepmines in the United
Coal output in the United Kingdom, measured from opencast and deepmined sources. This is measured in tonnes of coal per year.
Data source: Department for Business, Energy & Industrial Strategy (BEIS)
